mapper.insert: insert into b_nodes( node_id, machine_name, ip_address, pid_number, heart_beat_time, state, type, creater, create_time, iscancel, remark ) values ( #{nodeId}, #{machineName}, #{ipAddress}, #{pidNumber}, #{heartBeatTime}, #{state}, #{type}, #{creater}, #{createTime}, #{iscancel}, #{remark} )
mapper.update: update b_nodes set node_id = #{nodes.nodeId}, machine_name = #{nodes.machineName}, ip_address = #{nodes.ipAddress}, pid_number = #{nodes.pidNumber}, heart_beat_time = #{nodes.heartBeatTime}, state = #{nodes.state}, type = #{nodes.type}, creater = #{nodes.creater}, create_time = #{nodes.createTime}, iscancel = #{nodes.iscancel}, remark = #{nodes.remark} where id = #{id}
mapper.select: select id, node_id AS nodeId, machine_name AS machineName, ip_address AS ipAddress, pid_number AS pidNumber, heart_beat_time AS heartBeatTime, state, type, creater, create_time AS createTime, iscancel, remark from b_nodes where id = #{id}

select id, node_id AS nodeId, machine_name AS machineName, ip_address AS ipAddress, pid_number AS pidNumber, heart_beat_time AS heartBeatTime, state, type, creater, create_time AS createTime, iscancel, remark from b_nodes where 1=1 limit #{page.offset},#{page.pageSize}
